Name: Moving Shoot
Intro: Attack the target while moving.

Name: Red Orb
Intro: Spins and fires multiple shots.

Name: Yellow Orb
Intro: Fires an incendiary bomb at the target, which will leave a burning area on hit.

Name: Blue Orb
Intro: Fires 1 explosive at the target, which will slightly repel the enemies in range on hit.

Name: 360Â° Shooting
Intro: Signature Move: Shoots continuously to the surroundings, dealing massive damage.

Name: Shotgun
Intro: Launches scattershot attacks and uses the recoil to move around.

Name: Red Orb
Intro: Switches to the cannon mode, during which time gains Super Armor and takes 50% more DMG.

Name: Yellow Orb
Intro: Rushes to the target and fires two scattering projectiles in a row.

Name: Blue Orb
Intro: Shoots a special projectile that keeps pulling in enemies to the front. The enemies pulled in will take damage over time.

Name: Shattering Growl
Intro: Signature Move: Continuously bombards the target area.

Name: Swift Strike
Intro: Slash the target consecutively while moving. Press and hold to charge and fire a small/medium electromagnetic cannon.

Name: Red Orb
Intro: Unleashes 3 swordwaves to the front.

Name: Yellow Orb
Intro: Raises the shield and performs a 2-phase dash to the target.

Name: Blue Orb
Intro: Throws the shield at the target to deal damage and retrieves it, during which time the shield can pull the enemy.

Name: Absolving Spear
Intro: Rosetta: Rigor rises into the air and aims her ion cannon toward the ground. While charging up energy, nearby enemies will be continuously dragged in and damaged. Once the cannon is fully charged, it fires a large area blast.

Name: Lightning
Intro: Each dodge reduces the Signal Orb Skill CD. When dodging, summons a lightning stroke that will restore some Dodge Gauge value on hit.

Name: Red Orb
Intro: Shoots 1 ion shot at the target, which will knock the enemy down on hit.

Name: Yellow Orb
Intro: Creates a cube where the target stands. Enemies within the range will suffer from time lag and take damage over time.

Name: Blue Orb
Intro: Creates an ion wall where the target stands, which deals Lightning DMG to enemies who pass through it.

Name: Thunder Reflection
Intro: Summons a lightning area that heals the character but deals DMG to the enemy for 5s.
